nodes.text: Proponents for a Standard Revised Galactic Continuity
The Proponents for a Standard Revised Galactic Continuity was an organization that existed during the time of the Galactic Republic.

The organization once complained to the Republic about the holowright Peshosloc's works on the subject of Xim the Despot, claiming that Peshosloc had changed the truth about historical events for the sake of entertainment value.
